distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for sqlite3 fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:	  

- CVE-2019-8457: Fixed a Heap out-of-bound read in rtreenode() when handling invalid rtree tables (bsc#1136976).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: SQLite3 from 3.6.0 to and including 3.27.2 is vulnerable to heap out-of-bound read in the rtreenode() function when handling invalid rtree tables.
notes.title: CVE description
